exception.name: ErrorClientIdNotFound
exception.description: This exception is thrown if no data has been found for the provided clientID in the context of the export of stored data.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorClientIdNotFound that is thrown if no data has been found for the provided clientID in the context of the export of stored data.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when exporting data for a clientId that has no associated data
specification.applicability: Data export operations with client filtering
